title: New: Julia Jaye – Traffic Lights
content: I can honestly say this is the first time I’ve ever stumbled across Air BnB listings when trying to find out more information on a musician. Aside from apparently being a cracking host, LA’s Julia Jaye has a great voice, as shown on her newest track, Traffic Lights. Featuring some rather impeccable production, it evolves into a gloriously over the top dream-pop number; a hugely enjoyable listen.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
